briefTitle: FS VH S/D 500 S-apr in Vascular Surgery
officialTitle: Clinical Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of FS VH S/D 500 S-apr for Hemostasis in Subjects Undergoing Vascular Surgery
conditions: Hemostasis in Participants Receiving Peripheral Vascular Expanded Polytetrafluoroethylene (ePTFE) Graft Prostheses

interventions.name: Fibrin Sealant, Vapor Heated, Solvent/Detergent-treated with 500 IU/ml thrombin and synthetic aprotinin (FS VH S/D 500 s-apr)

arms.label: Manual compression with surgical gauze pads

summary: The purpose of this study was to compare safety and efficacy of FS VH S/D 500 s-apr (FS) versus manual compression in prosthetic expanded polytetrafluoroethylene (ePTFE) graft placement.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Hemostasis at 4 Minutes Post Treatment Application.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 4 minutes post start of treatment application

effectByArm.arm: Control - Manual Compression With Surgical Gauze
